TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Everyone is named no one. They all touch the hair. They mob your hair.

I wish for two people to touch the hair.

Granted. They touch your hair with sledgehammers, rather too hard.

I wish for snacks.

Granted. Several snacks materialize inside of your skull, causing rapid brain death.

I wish to be given a method of wishing for things, without them being corrupted, and to able to use that method starting now, and continuing indefinitely, without causing any adverse/unforseen effects to me, anyone else, my possessions, or anyone else's possesions, anything that is with the universe that I currently reside in, or any other universes/higher dimensions.

Granted. For your next wish, you accidentally wish for a personal performance from Justin Bieber every evening for the rest of your life. This wish is not corrupted, but instead is irrevocably granted.

I wish for less Justin Bieber.

Granted. The wish that I just accidentally made is given to you instead, thus resulting in less Justin Beiber from my perspective, but cursing you to a daily Justin Beiber performance.

I wish for my wish to be corrupted.

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Granted. Squad uses their evil superpowers(???!!?) to banish you to the KSP universe to be destroyed. No lag, though!

I wish that Squad had evil superpowers(???!!?)

I wish to be given a method of wishing for things, without them being corrupted, and to able to use that method starting now, and continuing indefinitely, without causing any adverse/unforseen effects to me, anyone else, my possessions, or anyone else's possesions, anything that is with the universe that I currently reside in, or any other universes/higher dimensions.
Out of sequence, but I feel obliged to corrupt it anyway: Granted, but the method doesn't work.

As for Squad, granted. They have the power to make addictive science-based video games.

I wish the person after next would wish for a biscuit.

Granted

*TRIES TO RESIST* I....WISH......FOR.....B-B....B-BISCUIT!

Granted. The value is increased to two wishes, because cheese.

I wish for a tortilla to grant my wish.

Granted, but you eat the tortilla and then you get food poisoning.

I wish for the ability to freeze time!

Granted, but since tortillas aren't sentient, and thus can't play silly forum games, a red blooded troll grants your wish instead.

EDIT: ninja'd

Granted. Your copy of time magazine is waiting for you in the freezer

I wish for these:

Edited November 13, 2014 by temporalExile

Granted. They are 0.625 m across and just will not work with Tweakscale or any other resizing methods.

I wish Kerbals walked faster. I mean seriously, they go at like 0.1 mpg.

Granted. They glitch so much that as soon as you go into the VAB, your computer crashes.

I wish Stalin never corrupted the USSR and Eastern Europe during the Cold War.

Dang ninjas anyways.

Granted, because Napoleon conquered Russia and all Europe, the Cold War was between France and the USA, and now people make jokes about American soldiers surrendering while the French Navy has ten aircraft carriers.

I wish that comet Siding Spring had hit Mars.

Granted. But the comet automatically squeezes back to earth and targets you and kills you directly without burning up in the atmosphere

I wish that everyone in the entire world had food,without bad guys stealing it,and make so a law that makes government rulers over the land,in like the other part of the world,wont take the food away.

granted. all government officalls are criminals

i wish for food.
Granted. The food magically appears in various places inside of your rib cage, causing fatal organ damage
I wish people would stop making wishes.

granted, but i must wish.

i wish for a box of cats.

granted, they eat you as they are live Bobcats

refer to comic for visuals

i wish for the power of teleportation

granted. you teleport into the middle of a mountain and suffocate.

i wish for infinite wishes

Granted, but they all get horribly corrupted and you always end up wishing everything back to normal =(

I wish there was a live, full grown hippopotamus in the below user's living room.

Granted. The room's empty at the moment because we're decorating, and the hippo exits through the window leaving just a bit of broken glass that our landlord will fix.

I wish I didn't have to set up web filtering.

granted. web filtering does not exist.

i wish my wishes were not courrupt.
